hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Qatada:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "When you drink (water), do not breath in the vessel; and when you urinate, do not touch your penis with your right hand. And when you cleanse yourself after defecation, do not use your right hand

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ التَّنَفُّسِ، فِي الإِنَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: It is forbidden to breathe in the vessel (while drinking)
